page.title: 14KNIGHTSRIDGE GALA DAY
page.content: The Knightsridge Gala Day is a big occasion for many people. This year was very important to my friend as she was Gala Queen. The Gala this year was held on June 22nd at the big football pitch. It was a damp, grey day but this did not stop us from enjoying ourselves. The fun started with a parade leaving from the north side of Knightsridge and travelling to the family centre. A shire horse pulling a cart led the way and this was followed by a large car with the gala Queen and her entourage. Behind them came Scouts, Girl Guides, Brownies, and representatives from various other organisations in the area. When the parade had arrived at the centre the Queen was crowned and then the real fun started. We had races and novelty games, competitions and there were stalls to buy from. It was a great day
